mapper.insert: insert into shoppingcart( consumer_id, product_id, product_name, product_price, product_num, product_surfacePlot) values( #{consumer_id}, #{product_id}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_num}, #{product_surfacePlot})
mapper.update: update shoppingcart set product_name=#{name} where product_id=#{product_id}
update shoppingcart set product_price=#{price} where product_id=#{product_id}
update shoppingcart set product_num=#{num} where consumer_id=#{consumer_id} and product_id=#{product_id}
update shoppingcart set product_surfacePlot=#{surfacePlot} where product_id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from shoppingcart where consumer_id=#{consumer_id} and product_id=#{product_id}
